tit.j: 京都府にある建造物の重要文化財一覧
tit.e: List of buildings and structures in Kyoto Prefecture which have been designated as important cultural properties
List of buildings and structures in Kyoto Prefecture which have been designated as important cultural properties
List of buildings and structures in Kyoto Prefecture which have been designated as important cultural properties

sen.j: 京都府にある建造物の重要文化財一覧（きょうとふにあるけんぞうぶつのじゅうようぶんかざいいちらん）は、重要文化財の建造物のうち、京都府にあるものの一覧である。
sen.e: The list of buildings and structures in Kyoto Prefecture which have been designated as important cultural properties is a list of buildings and structures which exist in Kyoto Prefecture and have been designated as important cultural property.

The list of buildings and structures in Kyoto Prefecture which have been designated as important cultural properties lists those existing in Kyoto Prefecture from all the buildings and structures designated as important cultural property in Japan.
sen.cmt: 重複が多くわかりにくいので修正しました。
sen.e: The list of buildings and structures in Kyoto Prefecture which have been designated as important cultural properties lists those existing in Kyoto Prefecture from all the buildings and structures designated as important cultural property in Japan.

sen.j: 文化財保護法では重要文化財は大きく「建造物」と「美術工芸品」の2つの部に分かれているが、本記事では建造物のみを扱う。
sen.e: In the Act on Protection of Cultural Properties, important cultural properties are roughly classified into "buildings and structures" and "works of arts and crafts," but, in this article, only buildings and structures are listed.

In the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties, important cultural properties are broadly divided into "buildings and structures" and "works of arts and crafts," and this section highlights the buildings and structures only.
sen.cmt: 用語共有リストの反映その他表現を若干修正しました。
sen.e: In the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties, important cultural properties are broadly divided into "buildings and structures" and "works of arts and crafts," and this section highlights the buildings and structures only.

sen.j: なお重要文化財のうち特に価値の高いものは国宝に指定されており、国宝も重要文化財の一種である。
sen.e: Among important cultural properties, those which have especially important value have been designated as national treasure and, therefore, national treasures are included in important cultural properties.

Among important cultural properties, those which have especially important value have been designated as national treasure and, therefore, national treasures are included in important cultural properties.

Among important cultural properties, those which have especially important value have been designated as national treasure and, therefore, national treasures are included in important cultural properties.

sen.j: 京都府には、287件が指定されている（うち国宝48件）。
sen.e: In Kyoto Prefecture, 287 buildings and structures have been designated (including 48 national treasures).
In Kyoto Prefecture, 287 buildings and structures have been designated (including 48 national treasures).
In Kyoto Prefecture, 287 buildings and structures have been designated (including 48 national treasures).
